summary: Game hub application with multiple playable games including Flappy Bird
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Pixel art flappy bird character sprite with yellow body and small wings (flappy-bird-sprite.dim_64x64.png)
- Green pipe obstacle sprite in pixel art style for Flappy Bird game (pipe-sprite.dim_64x128.png)

existing_features.title: Ensure the game play button opens a game selection interface that displays Flappy Bird along with other available games (Snake, Pong, Breakout)
Implement a fully playable Flappy Bird game with bird physics, pipe obstacles, score tracking, and game over detection
Integrate the Flappy Bird game template into GamePlayer component alongside existing game templates (Snake, Pong, Breakout)

new_feature_requests.summary: Add multiple playable games (Flappy Bird, etc.) accessible from play button
